assigninstance.name: AssignInstance
assigninstance.description: Grants permission to assign a registered instance to a layer

assignvolume.name: AssignVolume
assignvolume.description: Grants permission to assign one of the stack's registered Amazon EBS volumes to a specified instance

associateelasticip.name: AssociateElasticIp
associateelasticip.description: Grants permission to associate one of the stack's registered Elastic IP addresses with a specified instance

attachelasticloadbalancer.name: AttachElasticLoadBalancer
attachelasticloadbalancer.description: Grants permission to attach an Elastic Load Balancing load balancer to a specified layer

clonestack.name: CloneStack
clonestack.description: Grants permission to create a clone of a specified stack

createapp.name: CreateApp
createapp.description: Grants permission to create an app for a specified stack

createdeployment.name: CreateDeployment
createdeployment.description: Grants permission to run deployment or stack commands

createinstance.name: CreateInstance
createinstance.description: Grants permission to create an instance in a specified stack

createlayer.name: CreateLayer
createlayer.description: Grants permission to create a layer

createstack.name: CreateStack
createstack.description: Grants permission to create a new stack

createuserprofile.name: CreateUserProfile
createuserprofile.description: Grants permission to create a new user profile

deleteapp.name: DeleteApp
deleteapp.description: Grants permission to delete a specified app

deleteinstance.name: DeleteInstance
deleteinstance.description: Grants permission to delete a specified instance, which terminates the associated Amazon EC2 instance

deletelayer.name: DeleteLayer
deletelayer.description: Grants permission to delete a specified layer

deletestack.name: DeleteStack
deletestack.description: Grants permission to delete a specified stack

deleteuserprofile.name: DeleteUserProfile
deleteuserprofile.description: Grants permission to delete a user profile

deregisterecscluster.name: DeregisterEcsCluster
deregisterecscluster.description: Grants permission to delete a user profile

deregisterelasticip.name: DeregisterElasticIp
deregisterelasticip.description: Grants permission to deregister a specified Elastic IP address

deregisterinstance.name: DeregisterInstance
deregisterinstance.description: Grants permission to deregister a registered Amazon EC2 or on-premises instance

deregisterrdsdbinstance.name: DeregisterRdsDbInstance
deregisterrdsdbinstance.description: Grants permission to deregister an Amazon RDS instance

deregistervolume.name: DeregisterVolume
deregistervolume.description: Grants permission to deregister an Amazon EBS volume

describeagentversions.name: DescribeAgentVersions
describeagentversions.description: Grants permission to describe the available AWS OpsWorks agent versions

describeapps.name: DescribeApps
describeapps.description: Grants permission to request a description of a specified set of apps

describecommands.name: DescribeCommands
describecommands.description: Grants permission to describe the results of specified commands

describedeployments.name: DescribeDeployments
describedeployments.description: Grants permission to request a description of a specified set of deployments

describeecsclusters.name: DescribeEcsClusters
describeecsclusters.description: Grants permission to describe Amazon ECS clusters that are registered with a stack

describeelasticips.name: DescribeElasticIps
describeelasticips.description: Grants permission to describe Elastic IP addresses

describeelasticloadbalancers.name: DescribeElasticLoadBalancers
describeelasticloadbalancers.description: Grants permission to describe a stack's Elastic Load Balancing instances

describeinstances.name: DescribeInstances
describeinstances.description: Grants permission to request a description of a set of instances

describelayers.name: DescribeLayers
describelayers.description: Grants permission to request a description of one or more layers in a specified stack

describeloadbasedautoscaling.name: DescribeLoadBasedAutoScaling
describeloadbasedautoscaling.description: Grants permission to describe load-based auto scaling configurations for specified layers

describemyuserprofile.name: DescribeMyUserProfile
describemyuserprofile.description: Grants permission to describe a user's SSH information

describeoperatingsystems.name: DescribeOperatingSystems
describeoperatingsystems.description: Grants permission to describe the operating systems that are supported by AWS OpsWorks Stacks

describepermissions.name: DescribePermissions
describepermissions.description: Grants permission to describe the permissions for a specified stack

describeraidarrays.name: DescribeRaidArrays
describeraidarrays.description: Grants permission to describe an instance's RAID arrays

describerdsdbinstances.name: DescribeRdsDbInstances
describerdsdbinstances.description: Grants permission to describe Amazon RDS instances

describeserviceerrors.name: DescribeServiceErrors
describeserviceerrors.description: Grants permission to describe AWS OpsWorks service errors

describestackprovisioningparameters.name: DescribeStackProvisioningParameters
describestackprovisioningparameters.description: Grants permission to request a description of a stack's provisioning parameters

describestacksummary.name: DescribeStackSummary
describestacksummary.description: Grants permission to describe the number of layers and apps in a specified stack, and the number of instances in each state, such as running_setup or online

describestacks.name: DescribeStacks
describestacks.description: Grants permission to request a description of one or more stacks

describetimebasedautoscaling.name: DescribeTimeBasedAutoScaling
describetimebasedautoscaling.description: Grants permission to describe time-based auto scaling configurations for specified instances

describeuserprofiles.name: DescribeUserProfiles
describeuserprofiles.description: Grants permission to describe specified users

describevolumes.name: DescribeVolumes
describevolumes.description: Grants permission to describe an instance's Amazon EBS volumes

detachelasticloadbalancer.name: DetachElasticLoadBalancer
detachelasticloadbalancer.description: Grants permission to detache a specified Elastic Load Balancing instance from its layer

disassociateelasticip.name: DisassociateElasticIp
disassociateelasticip.description: Grants permission to disassociate an Elastic IP address from its instance

gethostnamesuggestion.name: GetHostnameSuggestion
gethostnamesuggestion.description: Grants permission to get a generated host name for the specified layer, based on the current host name theme

grantaccess.name: GrantAccess
grantaccess.description: Grants permission to grant RDP access to a Windows instance for a specified time period

listtags.name: ListTags
listtags.description: Grants permission to return a list of tags that are applied to the specified stack or layer

rebootinstance.name: RebootInstance
rebootinstance.description: Grants permission to reboot a specified instance

registerecscluster.name: RegisterEcsCluster
registerecscluster.description: Grants permission to register a specified Amazon ECS cluster with a stack

registerelasticip.name: RegisterElasticIp
registerelasticip.description: Grants permission to register an Elastic IP address with a specified stack

registerinstance.name: RegisterInstance
registerinstance.description: Grants permission to register instances with a specified stack that were created outside of AWS OpsWorks

registerrdsdbinstance.name: RegisterRdsDbInstance
registerrdsdbinstance.description: Grants permission to register an Amazon RDS instance with a stack

registervolume.name: RegisterVolume
registervolume.description: Grants permission to register an Amazon EBS volume with a specified stack

setloadbasedautoscaling.name: SetLoadBasedAutoScaling
setloadbasedautoscaling.description: Grants permission to specify the load-based auto scaling configuration for a specified layer

setpermission.name: SetPermission
setpermission.description: Grants permission to specify a user's permissions

settimebasedautoscaling.name: SetTimeBasedAutoScaling
settimebasedautoscaling.description: Grants permission to specify the time-based auto scaling configuration for a specified instance

startinstance.name: StartInstance
startinstance.description: Grants permission to start a specified instance

startstack.name: StartStack
startstack.description: Grants permission to start a stack's instances

stopinstance.name: StopInstance
stopinstance.description: Grants permission to stop a specified instance

stopstack.name: StopStack
stopstack.description: Grants permission to stop a specified stack

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to apply tags to a specified stack or layer

unassigninstance.name: UnassignInstance
unassigninstance.description: Grants permission to unassign a registered instance from all of it's layers

unassignvolume.name: UnassignVolume
unassignvolume.description: Grants permission to unassign an assigned Amazon EBS volume

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a specified stack or layer

updateapp.name: UpdateApp
updateapp.description: Grants permission to update a specified app

updateelasticip.name: UpdateElasticIp
updateelasticip.description: Grants permission to update a registered Elastic IP address's name

updateinstance.name: UpdateInstance
updateinstance.description: Grants permission to update a specified instance

updatelayer.name: UpdateLayer
updatelayer.description: Grants permission to update a specified layer

updatemyuserprofile.name: UpdateMyUserProfile
updatemyuserprofile.description: Grants permission to update a user's SSH public key

updaterdsdbinstance.name: UpdateRdsDbInstance
updaterdsdbinstance.description: Grants permission to update an Amazon RDS instance

updatestack.name: UpdateStack
updatestack.description: Grants permission to update a specified stack

updateuserprofile.name: UpdateUserProfile
updateuserprofile.description: Grants permission to update a specified user profile

updatevolume.name: UpdateVolume
updatevolume.description: Grants permission to update an Amazon EBS volume's name or mount point
